title: Social Media-Based Political Knowledge Acquisition Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social science knowledge and social media utilization experience
context.additional_context: Students analyze and discuss real-time political issues using social media platforms on personal devices, experiencing data collection and interpretation processes based on scientific methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can apply a framework for critically analyzing politically themed content on social media.
Learners can structure arguments about political phenomena using scientific evidence in online discussions.
Learners can comparatively evaluate how platform-specific characteristics of social media influence political knowledge acquisition.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
